product_name: Arc'teryx Phase AR Long Underwear Zip-Neck Top - Men's
long_description: Built with a ventilating zipper to keep you comfortable during stop-and-go activities, the Arc'teryx Phase AR long underwear zip-neck top offers midweight warmth in cold weather. Midweight polyester and polypropylene fabric wicks moisture and keeps you comfortable during high-output activity and dries quickly to regulate temperature. A smooth surface makes it easy to put on additional layers, and mechanical stretch woven into the fabric moves with you. Encapsulated silver ions help fight odors. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Gusseted underarms allow a full range of motion without binding. Flatlock seams feel great next to skin; heat transfer label gets rid of that annoying tag. The Arc'teryx Phase AR long underwear zip-neck top offers a next-to-skin fit.
